alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 10:27PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT TUCKER AND SOUTHERN PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1027 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Rowlesburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingwood, Parsons, Terra Alta, Davis, Thomas, Rowlesburg, Newburg, Hendricks, Hambleton, Tunnelton, Hannahsville, Elk, Pheasant Run, Aurora, Davisville, Cortland, Canaan Hgts, Elgon, Benbush, and Lead Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM EDT for northeastern West Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Preston; Western Tucker
